channel.title: Need help with simple problem on 508 server
channel.description:
ok on my 508 when you log in on the login screen it says te source instead of my server name...
how do i change that...it is ip based so there is NO client.java
it uses codeusa...
please help me

item.title: Need help with simple problem on 508 server
item.dc:creator: @weezyfbaby weezyfbaby
item.description:
@weezyfbaby wrote:

Thanks, i know how to make myself admin now, but i was wondering to host my server…

would people have to use a client or use an IP changer?
look what i’ve found that managed forex

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with simple problem on 508 server

item.title: Need help with simple problem on 508 server
item.dc:creator: @Abdullah111 Abdullah111
item.description:
@Abdullah111 wrote:

Ok open u’r soucre.

Go to Build.

Open Data.

Open characters.

Open Mainsave.

Search for u’r name.

Right click on it.

Open with WordPad.

Search for rights:0

Change the 0 into 2. For Owner/Admin

Change it to 1 for Moderator.
3 is Hidden Admin

Save it and GL with it.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with simple problem on 508 server

item.title: Need help with simple problem on 508 server
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

You seem to be a little new to coding; I suggest starting with a 317, not a 508.
508’s can be confusing if you don’t know what to do whatsoever.
Anyways, look in your character files?

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with simple problem on 508 server

item.title: Need help with simple problem on 508 server
item.dc:creator: @B2300_T4nk B2300 T4nk
item.description:
@B2300_T4nk wrote:

You go to character files, and open ur datfile with wordpad. And edit your rights. Its either 1 or 2. 1: Mod, 2: Admin.

Read full topic
